fields.name: Curl Up:
fields.value: When used, you gain an additional 0.4x defense for each Cat you placed above the prior Evening phase. If you are the lowest placing Cat, this ability does nothing.

fields.name: Beg For Treats (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocks when you place in the top 3. Beg the host for some treats that you can share among your fellow Cats! All cats receive an additional 0.3x defense when you use this ability.

fields.name: Sleeping On The Job (Charge 100%):
fields.value: Choose a fellow Cat, and then choose a redirect target. You will sleep outside of their house, which will redirect all visitors to that player to their neighbour (the chosen target). This ability cannot be stopped by roleblocking.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully prevent two attacks on Cat members.
